results.name: a(n) = number of terms of A005187 needed to sum to n using the greedy algorithm.
comment: a(0) = 0, because no numbers are needed to form an empty sum, which is zero.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 17 2015
